description: This file defines an Angular service called AuthService that manages user authentication state, including login, signup, logout, and session verification, by interfacing with a Supabase backend.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Angular service for handling authentication state, user session management, and exposing auth status as observables.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates user with email and password via Supabase, updates auth state accordingly.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password using Supabase.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Signs out the current user, resets authentication state.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Returns an observable boolean indicating whether the user is authenticated.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns an observable that emits the current user ID or null.
